mapper.insert: insert into crawl_task ( site_id, down_system_site_id, down_system_id, bind_timeout_time )values( #{siteId}, #{downSystemSiteId}, #{downSystemId}, date_add(current_timestamp,interval (select task_bind_timeout from down_system_site dss where dss.id = #{downSystemSiteId}) hour) )
mapper.select: select * from crawl_task ct join down_system_site dss on ct.down_system_site_id = dss.id join down_system ds on dss.down_system_id =ds.id join site s on dss.site_id = s.id where -- 0 wait to bind ct.task_status = 0 -- enable filter and s.enable_status = 1 and ds.enable_status = 1 and dss.enable_status = 1 -- bind level filter and ct.bind_count >= #{minBindCount} and ct.bind_count < #{maxBindCount} -- max con filter and dss.task_current_running_count < dss.task_max_running_count and ds.task_current_running_count < ds.task_max_running_count order by 0.3 * ds.priority / 10 + 0.2 * dss.priority / 10 + 0.15 * (ds.task_max_running_count -ds.task_current_running_count)/ds.task_max_running_count+ 0.1 * (dss.task_max_running_count-dss.task_current_running_count)/dss.task_max_running_count+ 0.15 * (ds.url_total_count-ds.url_finished_count)/ds.url_total_count+ 0.1 * (dss.url_total_count- dss.url_finished_count)/dss.url_total_count desc, ct.create_time asc

select * from crawl_task ct join down_system_site dss on ct.down_system_site_id = dss.id join down_system ds on dss.down_system_id =ds.id join site s on dss.site_id = s.id where -- 0 wait to bind ct.task_status = 0 and s.enable_status = 1 and ds.enable_status = and dss.enable_status = 1 and ct.bind_count >= 25 and dss.task_current_running_count < dss.task_max_running_count and ds.task_current_running_count < ds.task_max_running_count order by 0.3 * ds.priority / 10 + 0.2 * dss.priority / 10 + 0.15 * (ds.task_max_running_count -ds.task_current_running_count)/ds.task_max_running_count+ 0.1 * (dss.task_max_running_count-dss.task_current_running_count)/dss.task_max_running_count+ 0.15 * (ds.url_total_count-ds.url_finished_count)/ds.url_total_count+ 0.1 * (dss.url_total_count- dss.url_finished_count)/dss.url_total_count desc, ct.create_time asc

update crawl_task set
crawler_id = #{crawlerId},
cookie_id = #{cookieId},
proxy_id = #{proxyId},
bind_last_result = 1, bind_last_time = current_timestamp, bind_last_msg = 'success', bind_count = bind_count + 1, task_status = 1 where id = #{id}
update crawl_task set bind_last_result = #{bindLastResult}, bind_last_time = current_timestamp, bind_last_msg = #{bindLastMsg}, bind_count = bind_count + 1 where id = #{id}
mapper.select:
select -- crawler config ct.crawler_id, dss.crawler_auto_download_page as auto_download_page, dss.crawler_crawl_type as crawl_type , dss.crawler_page_encoding as encoding, dss.crawler_page_timeout as download_page_timeout,
-- url config dss.url_match_patterns , dss.url_encodes,
dss.script_path,
ct.cookie_id, ck.cookie,
ct.id as task_id, ct.site_id, ct.down_system_site_id,
ct.proxy_id,
-- ahead 2 min than real task timeout (date_add(ct.task_timeout_time,interval -2 minute)) as task_timeout, -- site s.ip_minute_speed_limit from crawl_task ct join down_system_site dss on ct.down_system_site_id =dss.id join down_system ds on dss.down_system_id =ds.id join site s on s.id = dss.site_id left join cookie ck on ct.cookie_id = ck.id where ct.task_status = 1 order by ct.create_time asc
mapper.update: update crawl_task set dispatch_last_result = 1, dispatch_last_msg = 'success', dispatch_last_time = current_timestamp, task_start_time = current_timestamp, task_timeout_time = date_add( current_timestamp, interval (select task_timeout from down_system_site dss where dss.id =#{downSystemSiteId}) minute ), task_status = 2 where id = #{id}

update crawl_task set dispatch_last_result = #{dispatchLastResult}, dispatch_last_msg = #{dispatchLastMsg}, dispatch_last_time = current_timestamp, -- set wait ot bind task_status = 0 where id = #{id}
update crawl_task set task_status = 3, task_finish_time = current_timestamp where id = #{id}
